mapper.select: SELECT (today_productTotal + today_experienceTotal + today_raiseTotal + today_hbTotal + today_sharingTotal + totay_profitTotal) as yesterday, (productTotal + experienceTotal + raiseTotal + hbTotal + sharingTotal + profitTotal) as accumulate from profit_table WHERE userId = #{userId}
